org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.orc

Class SparkOrcNewRecordReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.RecordReader<org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.orc.OrcStruct>
      • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.orc.SparkOrcNewRecordReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class SparkOrcNewRecordReader
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.RecordReader<org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io.orc.OrcStruct>
    This is based on hive-exec-1.2.1 OrcNewInputFormat.OrcRecordReader. This class exposes getObjectInspector which can be used for reducing NameNode calls in OrcRelation.
